name: Space Hoppers At Dawn
description:
Fight cowboys riding space hoppers because this is the best I could come up with, soznotsoz.

  • Up to 20 players
  • Local multiplayer
  • Terrible AI
  • Cowboys
  • Space Hoppers

OSX users: Please email me at jimmyhdn@gmail.com if the mac version doesn't work, thank you.

Linux Users:

Building Love games for Linux is weird, it's easier to just install love2D and use that to open SpaceStar.love. Use the commands below to get Love2D.

  • sudo add-apt-repository ppa:bartbes/love-stable
  • sudo apt-get update
  • sudo apt-get install love
